quotes.quote: The path to our destination is not always a straight one. We go down the wrong road, we get lost, we turn back. Maybe it doesn't matter which road we embark on. Maybe what matters is that we embark.
Sometimes you climb the mountain, and you fall and fail. Maybe there is a different path that will take you up. Sometimes a different mountain.
We all have friends and family who see one path for us, and we go a different path, and it's not necessarily what they would have wanted.
Never be afraid to tread the path alone. Know which is your path and follow it wherever it may lead you; do not feel you have to follow in someone else's footsteps.
The world's a forest, in which all lose their way; though by a different path each goes astray.
Just because my path is different doesn’t mean I’m lost.
If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.
In a forest of a hundred thousand trees, no two leaves are alike. And no two journeys along the same path are alike.
The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
If you’re not excited about it, it’s not the right path
Everything you want to be, you already are. You're simply on the path to discovering it.
Choose your own path, not the one others may want you to.
Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn't mean they're lost forever.
Happiness, success, excellence: They are not something you get for knowing the path; they are something you experience by walking it.
If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
Does the walker choose the path, or the path the walker?
There are no wrong turnings. Only paths we had not known we were meant to walk.
Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday.
When you find your path, you must ignore fear. You need to have the courage to risk mistakes. But once you are on that road... run, run, run, and don't stop til you've reached its end.
Follow your own path, no matter what people say.
Water is the most perfect traveller because when it travels it becomes the path itself!
Sometimes we can choose the paths we follow. Sometimes our choices are made for us. And sometimes we have no choice at all.
Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.
Don’t compare your path with anybody else’s. Your path is unique to you.
Surrender to your path, forget about time or speed, and most importantly walk in joy.
If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
Take the path where no one else dares to.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Watch your step.
We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious... and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
How others treat me is their path; how I react is mine.
You have to do what is right for you. No one walks in your shoes.
There is no path to Happiness. Happiness is the path. There is no path to Love. Love is the path. There is no path to Peace. Peace is the path.
No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
There are plenty of difficult obstacles in your path. Don't allow yourself to become one of them.
Build a better mousetrap and the world will beat a path to your door.
On this path let the heart be your guide.
The obstacle in the path becomes the path. Never forget, within every obstacle is an opportunity to improve our condition.
